definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the therapeutic value of low-energy helium-neon laser in hyperviscosity syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討低能量氦氖激光對高黏滯綜合徵的治療價值。

sentences.english: To explore the clinical epidemic rule and the influence factors of hyperviscosity syndrome(HVS).
sentences.chinese: 犤目的犦探討高黏滯血癥臨牀流行規律及其影響因素。

definition: yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
(of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
(TCM) plum-pit qi, a feeling of a lump in the throat (globus pharyngis) or of stagnant phlegm
to feel sick/to feel nauseous/to feel disgusted
shaking in fear/one's heart palpitating with fear
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
